flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: A very cautiousnPOKéMON, it raisesnitself up usingfits tail to get anbetter view of itsnsurroundings.
It stands on itsntail so it can seena long way. If itfspots an enemy, itncries loudly tonwarn its kind.
When acting as anlookout, it warnsnothers of dangerfby screeching andnhitting the groundnwith its tail.

When SENTRET sleeps, it does so whilenanother stands guard. The sentry wakesnthe others at the first sign of danger.fWhen this POKéMON becomes separatednfrom its pack, it becomes incapable ofnsleep due to fear.

When SENTRET sleeps, it does so whilenanother stands guard. The sentry wakesnthe others at the first sign of danger.fWhen this POKéMON becomes separatednfrom its pack, it becomes incapable ofnsleep due to fear.
They take turns standing guard when itnis time to sleep. The sentry awakens thenothers if it senses danger. If one becomesnseparated, it turns sleepless with fear.
It stands on its tail so it can see a longnway. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudlynto warn its kind.
A very cautious POKéMON, it raises itselfnup using its tail to get a better view ofnits surroundings.
It has a very nervous nature.nIt stands up high on its tail so itncan scan wide areas.
It has a very nervous nature.nIt stands up high on its tail so itncan scan wide areas.
It has a very nervous nature.nIt stands up high on its tail so itncan scan wide areas.
A very cautious Pokémon, it raisesnitself up using its tail to get anbetter view of its surroundings.
It stands on its tail so it can seena long way. If it spots an enemy, itncries loudly to warn its kind.
Ce Pokémon très nerveuxnprend appui sur sa queue pournobserver ses alentours.
It has a very nervous nature.nIt stands up high on its tail so itncan scan wide areas.
Ce Pokémon très nerveuxnprend appui sur sa queue pournobserver ses alentours.
It has a very nervous nature.nIt stands up high on its tail so itncan scan wide areas.
It has a very nervous nature.nIt stands up high on its tail so itncan scan wide areas.
It has a very nervous nature.nIt stands up high on its tail so itncan scan wide areas.
みはりやくは　するどく　ないたりnしっぽで　じめんを　たたいたりしてnなかまに　きけんを　しらせる。
망보기 역은 날카롭게 울거나n꼬리로 땅을 쳐서n동료에게 위험을 알린다.
S’il fait le guet, il prévient les autres d’un dangernen criant et en frappant le sol de sa queue.
Wenn es Wache hat, warnt es seine Artgenossen,nindem es schreit und mit dem Schwanz auf dennBoden schlägt.
Cuando hace de centinela, avisa del peligro a losndemás, chillando y dando golpes al suelo con la cola.
La vedetta avverte i suoi compagni del pericolongridando e battendo la coda sul terreno.
When acting as a lookout, it warns others of dangernby screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.
見張り役は　鋭く　鳴いたりn尻尾で　地面を　たたいたりしてn仲間に　危険を　知らせる。
とおくまで　みれるように　しっぽをnつかってたつ。てきを　みつけるとnおおごえで　なかまに　しらせる。
먼 곳까지 볼 수 있도록 꼬리를n사용해서 선다. 상대를 발견하면n큰 소리로 동료에게 알린다.
Il se tient dressé sur sa queue pour voir les ennemisnarriver de loin. À ce moment, il avertit ses amis.
Es stellt sich auf den Schweif, um weiter zu blicken.nErspäht es einen Feind, schreit es laut auf.
Se apoya sobre su cola para ver a mucha distancia.nSi divisa a un enemigo, dará la alarma a gritos.
Ritto sulla coda, guarda lontano. Se nota un nemiconlancia forti richiami per avvertire quelli della sua specie.
It stands on its tail so it can see a long way.nIf it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind.
遠くまで　見れるように　尻尾をn使って　立つ。敵を　見つけるとn大声で　仲間に　知らせる。
ねむる　ときには　こうたいで　みはりをする。nきけんを　さっちすると　なかまを　おこすのだ。nむれから　はぐれると　こわくて　ねむれなくなる。
잠잘 때는 교대로 망을 본다.n위험을 탐지하면 동료를 깨운다.n무리에서 떨어지면 무서워서 자지 못한다.

Lorsqu’un Fouinette dort, un autre monte la garde.nLa sentinelle réveille les autres au moindre signe de danger.nSi un de ces Pokémon est séparé de sa meute, il est incapablende dormir, car il a peur.

Wenn Wiesor schläft, hält immer jemand Wache. Beim erstennAnflug von Gefahr weckt die Wache die anderen auf. Wennndieses Pokémon von seinen Artgenossen getrennt wird,nkann es vor Angst nicht mehr schlafen.

Sentret no duerme a menos que otro haga guardia. El quenhace de centinela lo despertará al mínimo signo de peligro.nCuando este Pokémon se separa de su manada, es incapaznde echarse a dormir, presa del miedo.
Sentret dorme soltanto se un suo simile rimane vigile.nLa vedetta allerta gli altri al primo segnale di pericolo.nSe viene allontanato dal branco, questo Pokémonnnon riesce più a dormire dalla paura.

When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard.nThe sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger.nWhen this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack,nit becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.
眠る　ときには　交代で　見張りをする。n危険を　察知すると　仲間を　おこすのだ。n群れから　はぐれると　怖くて　眠れなくなる。
ねむる　ときには　こうたいで　みはりをする。nきけんを　さっちすると　なかまを　おこすのだ。nむれから　はぐれると　こわくて　ねむれなくなる。
잠잘 때는 교대로 망을 본다.n위험을 탐지하면 동료를 깨운다.n무리에서 떨어지면 무서워서 자지 못한다.

Lorsqu’un Fouinette dort, un autre monte la garde.nLa sentinelle réveille les autres au moindre signe de danger.nSi un de ces Pokémon est séparé de sa meute, il est incapablende dormir, car il a peur.

Wenn Wiesor schläft, hält immer jemand Wache. Beim erstennAnflug von Gefahr weckt die Wache die anderen auf. Wennndieses Pokémon von seinen Artgenossen getrennt wird,nkann es vor Angst nicht mehr schlafen.

Sentret no duerme a menos que otro haga guardia. El quenhace de centinela lo despertará al mínimo signo de peligro.nCuando este Pokémon se separa de su manada, es incapaznde echarse a dormir, presa del miedo.
Sentret dorme soltanto se un suo simile rimane vigile.nLa vedetta allerta gli altri al primo segnale di pericolo.nSe viene allontanato dal branco, questo Pokémonnnon riesce più a dormire dalla paura.

When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard.nThe sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. Whennthis Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomesnincapable of sleep due to fear.
眠る　ときには　交代で　見張りをする。n危険を　察知すると　仲間を　おこすのだ。n群れから　はぐれると　怖くて　眠れなくなる。
